title: Uncle Smiley goes recycling
creator_credit: Learning Corporation of America, Joe Sutherin and Jim Burroughs
brief_description: Introduces the term “recycling” to children and provides information about different recycling possibilities. Uncle Smiley and the children take their waste collection to a recycling depot where it is sorted prior to re-use. Suitable for middle and upper primary level.
